pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:8.2: (Sujato) I have corrected the punctuation of the MS edition here so as to agree with Samasūpakasikkhāpada. Here the text mistakenly had _hatthahāriyo_ in the next sentence.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:9.6: _Rasarase_. According to {Kkh.} this means any curries apart from bean curry: _ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbā pi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti_. My translation, however, is based on the fact that all other foods too are excluded.
